text: Lee Heung-kam (13 January 1932 – 4 January 2021) was a Hong Kong actress and singer. She was born in Shunde District, Guangdong. Her career began in 1948. Lee was known for her roles in Story of the White-Haired Demon Girl, Moonlight Resonance, and Can't Buy Me Love. Lee died on 4 January 2021 at a hospital in Hong Kong, aged 88.香港资深艺人李香琴因病家中去世 享年88岁 ==References== ==Other websites== * Lee Heung-kam at hkmdb.com * Lee Heung-kam at hkcinemagic.com Category:1932 births Category:2021 deaths Category:Chinese movie actors Category:Chinese television actors Category:Chinese stage actors Category:Hong Kong actors Category:20th-century Chinese actors
title: Lee Heung-kam
